subject: Golf
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
Medicine and Health
Testosterone
Beta Blockers
lead_paragraph: The PGA Tour barred Doug Barron for violating its antidoping policy after denying him an exemption for drugs he said he was taking to treat medical conditions.
snippet: The PGA Tour barred Doug Barron for violating its antidoping policy after denying him an exemption for drugs he said he was taking to treat medical conditions.
